about_the_game:
After resisting your abusers and losing your hands in the process, they saw only one option—to lock you away in a bare room, a form of mental torture. The room is completely empty. No furniture, no wallpapers, nothing but blank walls, forcing you to confront the overwhelming void and loneliness.

In an attempt to fill this emptiness, you start drawing on the walls. But do you truly understand what you’re creating?

Then, one day, a voice speaks to you—not through dreams, but directly in your mind. Her name is Mina, or at least you think it is. She tells you to escape, unlocking the doors and setting you free, but offers no explanation. Is this a trap? Can you trust her?

There’s only one way to find out. Use your head carefully.

  • Challenging rooms where you need to bypass all obstacles.

  • Have unique battle mechanics—The head acts as the sword, and dodging serves as the shield, but you have to time it right.

  • Unravel the stories and mysteries that the game has to offer.

  • Customize your characters with amazing hats—some hats are just hard to get...

  • Combat doesn't require killing—but sometimes, things take a darker turn.

  • Featuring original traditional hand-drawn art and an amazing in-game soundtrack.

Never close your eyes

name: Headrooms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 210 / AMD Radeon HD 5450
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: HeadRooms! The place where something becomes nothing.
